alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 3:29PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fairfield, southwestern Lancaster and west central Kershaw Counties through 415 PM EST... At 329 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winnsboro, moving east at 20 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Wateree Dam, Lake Wateree State Park, Liberty Hill, Longtown, Pine Grove Fire Station, and Lake Wateree near Highway 97. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 38 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
